entity.name: Projects
entity.query: select @rownum:=@rownum+1 as 'id', mp.partyid, m.title, m.description, m.ConsultationId, m.CreateDate from meetingparticipant mp join meeting m on m.productid = mp.productid JOIN (SELECT @rownum:=0) r where meetingtype = 'consultation' and (mp.GivenToClientDate is not null or mp.PaidDate is not null)
